eu.stratosphere.nephele.rpc

Class RPCEnvelope

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.rpc.RPCEnvelope

  • public class RPCEnvelope
extends java.lang.Object
    An RPC envelope is the basic data structure which wraps all other types of messages for the RPC communication. Its basic purpose is to provide a common entry point for serialization and to separate most of the serialization code from the actual RPC logic.

    This class is thread-safe.

    Author:
    warneke

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
